mapper.select: select A.BOARD_ID AS BOARD_ID, /*게시판시퀀스*/ A.TITLE AS TITLE, /*제목*/ A.CONTENT AS CONTENT, /*내용*/ A.MEMBERS_ID AS MEMBERS_ID, /*작성자*/ A.REG_DT AS REG_DT , /*등록일자*/ A.MOD_DT AS MOD_DT /*수정일자*/ from T_IFO_BOARD A, T_IFO_MEMBERS B WHERE A.MEMBERS_ID = B.id AND (A.MEMBERS_ID = #{searchVal} OR A.TITLE = #{searchVal});
SELECT MAX(BOARD_ID)+1 AS SEQ FROM T_IFO_BOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_IFO_BOARD ( BOARD_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, MEMBERS_ID, REG_DT, MOD_DT) VALUES ( #{boardseq}, #{subject}, #{item}, #{userId}, now(), now() );
